title: NEWZ048 Not A Tourist Accident
description: Unlike the rest of the internet today, we at Newz of the World are sticking with the facts, mostly. Starting with the riots in Myanmar that have killed dozens and displaced tens of thousands.  Meanwhile a very complex list of proposals is being disputed for the Southern European gas pipeline route.  Doctors in the UK say a new health policy that starts today will dismantle the public healthcare system.  Down in Egypt, divers were caught snipping cables in the Mediterranean.  Today's Newz Source is a one stop shop for policy and society news on the European Union level: Euractiv.com.
itunes:author: Metaebene Personal Media - Tim Pritlove
itunes:subtitle: Riots Myanmar; Southern European Gas Pipeline Race; Tibet Landslide; Privatization of the NHS; Undersea Cable Damage Egypt; Euractiv.com

content:encoded:
Riots Myanmar; Southern European Gas Pipeline Race; Tibet Landslide; Privatization of the NHS; Undersea Cable Damage Egypt; Euractiv.com

Unlike the rest of the internet today, we at Newz of the World are sticking with the facts, mostly. Starting with the riots in Myanmar that have killed dozens and displaced tens of thousands. Meanwhile a very complex list of proposals is being disputed for the Southern European gas pipeline route. Doctors in the UK say a new health policy that starts today will dismantle the public healthcare system. Down in Egypt, divers were caught snipping cables in the Mediterranean. Today's Newz Source is a one stop shop for policy and society news on the European Union level: Euractiv.com.
